thread.title: Kim Kardashian thanks everyone for their prayers after Lamar Odom wakes up - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian thanks everyone for their prayers after Lamar Odom wakes up - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Kim Kardashian thanks everyone for their prayers after Lamar Odom wakes up - Showbiz
text: Kim Kardashian West has thanked everyone for their prayers after Lamar Odom woke up and spoke on Friday (October 16).Odom was previously unresponsive in a Nevada hospital and breathing with the aid of machines, after reportedly being found unconscious at a brothel. I have faith in you. I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers! Lammy- I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today! God is good!A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Oct 17, 2015 at 9:44pm PDTAfter the happy news was announced, Kim posted a picture of herself with the former NBA star on Instagram, thanking her followers and God in the caption.She wrote: "I have faith in you. I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers!"Lammy- I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today! God is good!" © PA Images / Jordan Strauss/AP The Nye County Sheriff stated on Wednesday (October 14) that Odom was using cocaine and sexual performance enhancing supplements on the weekend before his hospitalisation.Khloé Kardashian and Odom separated in 2013 after four years of marriage, with their divorce finalised this year.
